jobDescription: Position Summary CVS/Caremark,the Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) division of CVS Health, is looking for a Healthcare Data Analyst to join our Eligibility Administration Department. As a Healthcare Data Analyst for a Fortune 10 organization, you will impact and support customers in all areas including Commercial, Medicare, Healthcare Plans & Group Waiver Plans (EGWP).  Primary responsibilities of the Healthcare Data Analyst include: Acting as a healthcare data subject matter expert on Eligibility guidelines and Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) protocol for clientsResearching and consulting to improve healthcare data integrity and ensure excellent service deliveryConstantly improving healthcare analytical skills that are needed to perform data analysisResolving data enrollment issues on a daily basisConsulting on healthcare data needsHaving exceptional time management and healthcare client management skillsContinuous development training will be provided in this role to ensure the Healthcare Data Analyst is able to exceed client expectations in this fast-paced environmentPosition Summary CVS/Caremark,the Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) division of CVS Health, is looking for a Healthcare Data Analyst to join our Eligibility Administration Department. As a Healthcare Data Analyst for a Fortune 10 organization, you will impact and support customers in all areas including Commercial, Medicare, Healthcare Plans & Group Waiver Plans (EGWP).  Primary responsibilities of the Healthcare Data Analyst include: Acting as a healthcare data subject matter expert on Eligibility guidelines and Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) protocol for clientsResearching and consulting to improve healthcare data integrity and ensure excellent service deliveryConstantly improving healthcare analytical skills that are needed to perform data analysisResolving data enrollment issues on a daily basisConsulting on healthcare data needsHaving exceptional time management and healthcare client management skillsContinuous development training will be provided in this role to ensure the Healthcare Data Analyst is able to exceed client expectations in this fast-paced environment Preferred Qualifications 3+ years in eligibility or other relevant background2+ years customer service or client-facing experience in a fast-paced environmentExperience in EDI (Electronic Data Interchange)Understanding of the PBM industryExperience in a healthcare client facing roleExperience in a fast paced environmentKnowledge of ANSI X12 834 Data DocumentsFamiliarity with RxClaim and/or AS400 Required Qualifications 1+ years in healthcare data eligibility, insurance, IT, benefits or data analytics environment with a strong ability to work independently, problem solve, and analyze data in a confidential healthcare environmentSDL2017
